item.description:
Seeing there was nothing on the schedule, i thought i would extend and invitation for a last minute gathering on the water Monday September 1st..

Come early and get a paddle in before the crowds and beat the traffic. We'll meet at E, Brimfield Lake at 8:00 and have our butts in the boats around 8:30. As for the agenda, we will decide then if we want to wander the lake or head up the river. Maybe even a bit of both. Early is the best time for wildlife here so we'll hope for the best.Meet at 8:00 at Long Pond boat ramp.

To get there -

From the Mass Pike to Rt. 20 West - Stay on Rt. 20 through the center of Sturbridge. About 1/2 mile after the intersection of Rt. 20 and 148 (stay on Rt. 20), there will be a brown sign saying "East Brimfield Dam", and then shortly after that is another brown sign with a picture of a boat ramp, the entrance to the ramp area is on the right shortly after the ramp sign. When you get down to the parking lot, the sign says "Long Pond / East Brimfield Lake".

From Rt. 20 East - Go over the lake, and the entrance to the boat ramp is the first left after you go over the lake.
item.name: Last Minute Early Riser Paddle at East Brimfield Lake Monday Sept 1 st.
